Question: In the spring of 1939, this person crossed to Cuba in his boat to live in the Hotel Ambos Mundos in Havana.
Hints: In 1954, while in Africa, this person was almost fatally injured in two successive plane crashes.
In 1933 this person and Pauline went on safari to East Africa.
His third son, Gregory Hancock ****, was born a year later on November 12, 1931 in Kansas City.
